rules: Use focus-visible rings for keyboard navigation.
All images must have alt text.
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons/labels).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Void & Neon' theme using the specified color palette.
Use 'Unbounded' font for all headings to give a distinct gamer look.
Apply glassmorphism to cards and sidebars, but ensure text readability.
Use the 'Tetris Grid' layout for the marketplace homepage.
Integrate the provided image URLs for hero sections and dummy products.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states with the 'neon' shadow glow.
Do not use generic 'Inter' for headings.
Create a 'KeyVault' component for displaying purchased keys securely.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
